cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper discusses a method for paper-reviewer recommendation, which is a task related to information retrieval (IR) and machine learning (ML). The proposed method uses a hierarchical and transparent representation, which is a common approach in natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (CL). The paper also mentions the use of deep learning (DL) techniques, which are commonly used in AI research. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, and cs.DL.
